documents.document: It pisses me off that I really start getting into bands after I've seen them. Would give anything to see Disturbed again 😩😩😩
@SophieJBullock SIGURDSSON SCORED SOPHIE
ALFIE FUCKING MAWSON
@Lloyd_Jacques The irony
@TweetingTommy32 In a heartbeat mate. You have no idea what you're in for
A 2 hour lecture on sociolinguistics isn't something that I need at 9am
The last 3 months have been so perfect for gigs. I'd cut off my arm to do it all again. Especially with my brother @Connor_B04 ❤️
It's just dawned on me that the back end of last week was quite possibly the best week I will ever have. I've peaked. Sad times

'You look like a proper catfish at the moment Ben'
Cheers Mase
Learning an entire module in 24 hours isn't the easiest thing I'll ever do
@97JDB_ Honestly, I'd love to be able to tell you
@ConnorFP That guy has a lot of heart
@ConnorFP Remember this? 👀 https://t.co/QnclcfjzdV
I've written an entire essay on face theory. Still have absolutely no clue about the subject whatsoever
@Olliebask I've been telling everyone this for years 😩
I'll only be happy with a Batshuayi for Llorente deal if Batshuayi dabs when he scores. Otherwise we need to keep Fernando
Happy 50th @ffi0nlewis ❤️ https://t.co/NywWBWI3k4
Wow. Bring on the 19th 😍 @ConnorFP https://t.co/xTtSIK7Bdc
My skills at taking photos of photos quite clearly need some work but my parents are the cutest https://t.co/15RgoXDQxL
Only been listening to them because they're supporting Avenged in a few weeks, but In Flames are quickly becoming one of my favourite bands
In need of the biggest Moos sesh ever known to man. Friday night can't come quick enough ❤️
Unis fun and all, but nothing will ever be able to beat a night out with my team #MyDargs #Easy3Points
Is there a worse defender than Jordi Amat?
People moaning about working Christmas Eve. I'm on my last day of 7 straight 12 hour shifts. Quit your complaining 😴
Strongly feeling the urge to learn every guitar part in Hotel California
My phone doesn't have enough battery for 12 hour shifts 😩
Quite possibly the most interesting life anyone has ever lived https://t.co/xgYeybZG8C
It's been 8 years since his last game for Barcelona but I still can't get over how entertaining Ronaldinho was 😩
MY LOVE FOR SLASH KNOWS NO BOUNDS
@ConnorFP the Motorpoint is gonna be a bit crammed 😂😂😂 https://t.co/8bag8uCg21
Never encountered more disrespect than witnessing @SophieJBullock dab along to Fat Lip by Sum 41 😤
Imagine being a second year English Language student and not being able to distinguish between a hypernym and a hyponym 🙄
@Lloyd_Jacques @FourFourTweet I saw him do that in a match once. The man is a legend.
Okay team, Guns N Roses have announced a U.K. date in June. Someone has to come with me
The Rolling Stones truly are the greatest musicians to ever walk the planet.
The entire band puts everyone else to complete and utter shame
He's undergone absolutely no change other than the fact that he now looks like a walking testicle
Mick Jagger was born in 1943. It is 2016. The man can still sing as though it's the fucking 60's.
So blessed to have seen my two favourite songs played live by my two favourite bands
Alter Bridge were incredible
@SophieJBullock Yeah but it melted in my mouth 😕
Yeah I reckon you are actually https://t.co/08A4a9CQ90
Can we just take a moment to appreciate that Leroy Fer has scored more goals this season than Pogba, De Bruyne and and Rooney combined?
@ConnorFP @DONBROCO @ENTERSHIKARI @BLAXUK Yeah just get the train up lad
Odds on the Swansea match still being last on @BBCMOTD? @GaryLineker
Easily the most stressful game of football I have ever witnessed.
WHAT EVEN IS FOOTBALL
As if its 5:43am and I'm still awake
This has killed me 😂😂😂 https://t.co/dfIWYzQNaU
Swear Rob Damiani's voice is the only thing getting me through life atm
Imagine a tumble dryer taking 5 hours to dry your clothes
'Joel Dommett dick pic' google searches have just gone through the roof
This is just brilliant. https://t.co/pzf5VGHTD1
@ffi0nlewis @EllieJerman @BBCBreaking Yeah I think it was actually 🤔
I never impress myself more than when I seem to be able to just shit out an essay out of the blue
On the bright side though, last time someone as unqualified as Trump won the election, his name was Ronald Reagan and he ended the Cold War
Just amazes me how America is so integral to so much of this planet's affairs, yet so dumb and fucking juvenile.
Imagine if Lord Sugar ran for Prime Minister, promised to rebuild Hadrian's wall, and everyone absolutely loved it and voted him in.
@ConnorFP Try and spot us 👀 https://t.co/DNhK3x5UfR
@EllieJerman @CostaCoffee @georgiaavanp Nah that's bent af where the real cups @
'You don't strike me as the kind of person who listens to heavy metal' Story of my fucking life 😴😴😴
@EllieJerman About half
@EllieJerman pls donate them to me
@EllieJerman That's my coursework sorted https://t.co/Gyv95THDVT
@DONBROCO @ENTERSHIKARI and @bmthofficial absolutely smashed it tonight. Bravo chaps 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
Okay I'm drinking wine and watching Strictly. Is this what being a middle aged woman feels like?
Why the fuck do people think it's acceptable to speak really fucking loudly on the phone on a train?
Imagine having the bollocks to make a 15 minute song that features a monologue from Neil deGrasse Tyson
The Stage is such a fucking bold album. Whatever Avenged seem to do just works every time 🤘🏻 #A7X
Love sitting in Costa for an hour listening to Alex and Ellie droning on about fucking coursework 😴😴😴
Is there a better build up to a song than Enter Sandman?
That Fire by Black Tide is such a fucking tune
How the fuck am I a second year English student that still can't wrap his fucking head around positive and negative face?! 😂😂😂😭😭😭😭
Dem ones when you're halfway through typing up a 9 minute transcript and your computer restarts itself 🙃🙂🙃🙂
Controversial call - The Stage may be my favourite @TheOfficialA7X song 🤔
I've still not come to terms with how well Synyster Gates absolutely slays it in the Stage
Ngl I've had better days than this
@ConnorFP HOENSTLY MATE IM SO HARD
@ConnorFP ITS FUCKING MAD
Imagine @DONBROCO having the cheek to retweet me
Had my ticket for months but I'm still not over the fact that I'm seeing @bmthofficial @DONBROCO and @ENTERSHIKARI all in one night 😍😍😍
I fucking love this city
Honestly, there is no better night out than Cardiff ❤️❤️❤️
As if Glam has actually produced a decent night
Alter Bridge have absolutely smashed it with The Last Hero. Roll on 28th of November 🤘🏻
State of my brother's cover photo on Facebook https://t.co/aqlg256aZw
Learned a very valuable life lesson today: Don't do anything to do with my course unless I have @EllieJerman there to hold my hand
@SophieJBullock Good for you?
Miss my boys 😔
@ambsya Why do you do this.
Whose dick do I have to suck in order for Giggs to replace Guidolin?
@EllieJerman You best get round ours as soon as you can
@EllieJerman Thanks Eliza, you're back tomorrow right?
@TweetingTommy32 Too right I am 😂
Tip to all freshers. When you're making food after a night out, use your flat mates plates and cutlery so you don't have to wash it up
Had such a great night out tonight
@alishadanielss ...That was Ffi 🙄
@ffi0nlewis There's a fucking pizza bar near our flat Ffi. We're moving up in the world
@ffi0nlewis Oi nah that's dinner on Tuesday you snake
Can't wait to get back to uni just so I can stop working 😒
